title: Seducción Salvaje
description: Savage Seduction follows the entangled lives of Armando, his pregnant girlfriend Maribel, her mother Alicia and her father Colonel Rafael Obregon, and the maid Carmen. Betrayal, secrets, and cursed brooches!
altHero: Armando, Carmen, and Colonel Rafael Obregon look at the camera
alt1: Carmen the maid is angry, holding a knife up to Maribel
alt4: Doña Fausta lays in bed but is shocked
